definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

sentences.english: During the night the retreat was halted in the rain for hours.
sentences.chinese: 在晚上，撤退的人马在雨中被阻达几个小时。

sentences.english: The star is about 10,000 light-years from Earth, in the constellation Centaurus. [Photo of the massive star.]
sentences.chinese: 该星体距离地球大约一万光年，位于半人马座。

sentences.english: As soon as the bus stopped, more than fifty people tried to crush in.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车一停住，五十多人马上一齐往上挤。

sentences.english: A group of people fro, amid is escorted Xu Shiyou team.
sentences.chinese: 山沟里走来一队人马，正是护送许世友的队伍。

sentences.english: The centaurs were invited to Pirithous' wedding as a gesture of goodwill .
sentences.chinese: 为了表示善意，皮里托斯邀请人马参加自己的婚宴。

sentences.english: Successive Japanese governments have refused to take responsibility for the sinking of the AHS Centaur.
sentences.chinese: 日本历届政府都拒绝承担责任的沉没的翰凯半人马。

sentences.english: St. Matthew is the patron saint of bankers.
sentences.chinese: 圣人马修被视为是银行家的保护神。

sentences.english: I decided that they took too long so I called all the people together and I repaired the altar of the Lord that was broken.
sentences.chinese: 我决定不再等了，开始召集人马修复我们的祭台。

sentences.english: Han Lengyan immediately anxious people, ready to rescue.
sentences.chinese: 韩冷烟立刻着急人马，准备去救人。

sentences.english: Several days later, all the soldiers and horses were cured.
sentences.chinese: 几天过后，全营人马的“尿血症”都治好了。

sentences.english: You see centaurs running to the trading post, knocking the walls down, burning and killing the merchants.
sentences.chinese: 你会看到半人马跑向交易所，推倒墙壁，烧杀商人。

sentences.english: He selected a team for the special task.
sentences.chinese: 他为这项特殊任务挑选了一组人马。

sentences.english: In an instant, a skycap was at his side.
sentences.chinese: 一个带宽边帽的人马上来到他身边。

sentences.english: The wise does at once what the fool does at least. ----Baltasar Gracian.
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人马上行动，愚蠢的人拖到最后一刻才行动。

sentences.english: It seemed as though that mass had become a monster and had but one soul.
sentences.chinese: 那一大队人马仿佛变成了一个怪物，并且只有一条心。

definition: to set out (of troops)/departure/start date (of military expedition)
